initials:
Hello! I am HyperBot, here to help you. Please tell me what you want to do:
1. Guide through the website
2. Contact Us

intents: I want to go to guide
utterance: Do you want to start the guide?

intents: I want to go to contact

initials:
You can choose to do the following: 1. Type your message in chat
2. Go to Contact page

intents: I want to go to type
utterance: You can now send your message from the chatbot.

intents: I want to go to contact
I want to go to contact

chatbot.unknown:
Message received. We will respond within 24 hours. Do you want to 1. Send another message (redirects to contact page)
2. End this conversation

kb.areas: Welcome to our Areas page! Here you can see all the areas that we work in! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.products: Welcome to our Products page! Here you can see all the products that we have built! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.teams: Welcome to Our Team page! Here you can see all the brilliant people that build our products! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.about: Welcome to The Company page! Here you can see who we are! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.contact: Welcome to Contact page! Here you can send us a message! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.home: Welcome to our home page! Please feel free to browse to each section at your own pace. Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.stay_message: I don't understand. Do you want to continue? Enter either next or continue or yes or go
